content:
Hey folks. I'm trying to get started on a new project, and working with a few things that are very new to me:

  • C++
  • vcpkg
  • Development on Windows

I have a library (https://github.com/powerof3/CommonLibSSE/) I want to link to, which relies on dependencies from vcpkg. I'm not entirely sure how to go about setting everything up so that I can bind CommonLib with cxx while making sure it and all requirements are built with vcpkg. Has anyone done something similar?
